name: Petrovskyi
motto: If it fits, I sits, if not, I meow until it does.

name: Dmytrovskyi
motto: In catnip we trust, all others bring treats.

name: Adelskyi
motto: I'm not lazy, I'm just conserving energy.

name: Dymkovskyi
motto: Purrfection takes time... and lots of naps.

name: Markovskyi
motto: Why chase mice when you can order them online?
